      • enterIfNotStopped

        public boolean enterIfNotStopped()
        Enter a cache call.
        Returns:
        True if enter successful, false if the cache or the node was stopped.

      • enterIfNotStoppedNoLock

        public boolean enterIfNotStoppedNoLock()
        Enter a cache call without lock.
        Returns:
        True if enter successful, false if the cache or the node was stopped.
